text: Khawa jarra nithum katungbit thaanhi katha ah ngaaknasik ah chong napepiro, kha emak inchu ama siamruoi ngai'n inhongli akaluong kha hongmaruup inta, amakha thiya inphut ahongringjei, tia mi ngaidiang hongrilcha; halli ma-insa maleisei khaneek ah nuk-intong maleisei khadoom kheella hongthamak acha.”
